_comment_service_indicator: The service indicator is part of the S10 standard for international mail.  The official reference for this is here: http://www.upu.int/uploads/tx_sbdownloader/S10TechnicalStandard.pdf

service_indicator.name: Letter Post M-bag
service_indicator.description: Direct sacks of printed matter sent to a single foreign addressee at a single address

service_indicator.name: Letter Post Registered
service_indicator.description: Prepaid first-class mail that is recorded by the post office before being sent and at each point along its route to safeguard against loss, theft, or damage.

service_indicator.name: Domestic
service_indicator.description: Mail designated for domestic, bilateral, or multilateral use
